current.label: esophagus muscularis mucosa
current.description: A muscularis mucosa that is part of a esophagus.
synonyms: lamina muscularis of esophageal mucous membrane

proposed.label: esophagus muscle
proposed.description: Any muscle organ that is part of a esophagus [Automatically generated definition].

rationale: Current term too specific (only muscularis mucosa), proposed covers general esophageal muscle tissue
